title: Sepp Blatter - Wikipedia
snippet: Joseph Sepp Blatter (born Josef Blatter; 10 March 1936) is a Swiss former football administrator who served as the eighth president of FIFA from 1998 to 2015. He has been suspended from participating in FIFA activities since 2015 as a result of the FIFA corruption case made public that year, ...

title: Former Fifa president Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini cleared in corruption case | Fifa | The Guardian
snippet: The former Fifa President Sepp Blatter and the France legend Michel Platini were have both been cleared of corruption charges by a Swiss court

title: Former FIFA President Sepp Blatter indicted for fraud
snippet: GENEVA â€” Former FIFA officials Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini were charged with fraud and other offenses by Swiss prosecutors on Tuesday after a six-year investigation into a controversial $2 million payment.
